title: Form a New LLC
description: A corporate paralegal needs to form a new Limited Liability Company (LLC) for a client in the state of Delaware.

tasks.description: Check the availability of the proposed company name with the Delaware Secretary of State.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the name is available for use.

tasks.description: Draft the Certificate of Formation with the required information (company name, registered agent).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent prepares the necessary formation document.

tasks.description: File the Certificate of Formation with the Delaware Secretary of State and pay the filing fee.
